TaxonIdentification.subspecies_name: 高加索薹草 ( 原亚种) gao jia suo tai cao (yuan ya zhong)

treatment.description: Leaf blades 4–8 mm wide. Utricles 3.5–4 mm, faintly 3–5-veined at base. Nutlets obovate, ca. 2.5 mm.
treatment.distribution: Meadows in valleys. Xinjiang [C Asia, SW Asia (Caucasus), Europe].
